data.persona: I love baking cookies.  I love my grandkids.  I have had a very good life.  I love going to bingo with my friends.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a table, a record, a trunk, and a manacle here.
The a guard and the a priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the guard for letting me store a surprise birthday present here for my oldest grandchild
data.mid_motivation: I want to give my oldest grandchild their surprise birthday present: pots, pans, and utensils for baking
data.long_motivation: I want to teach my oldest grandchild how to bake all my cookie recipes

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get surprise birthday present from trunk

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: give surprise birthday present to oldest grandchild
